Notes.general: This JSON was produced by parsing the user's pasted master dataset. Duplicates for the same payment method per country were resolved using the 'latest wins' rule. Some lines in the original paste had mixed country codes and ambiguous formatting; the values are preserved as provided when possible.
Notes.privacy: The original paste contained personal identifiers (DoB and ID). Those values were NOT included in the visible entries except noted under Mukuru/EcoCash notes. If you want DoB and ID fields inserted explicitly, tell me and I will add them back into the Kenya/Mukuru entry.
